Steps calculator

Calculate volume of steps.

Volume of concrete:

yd3

Number of pre-mix bags needed:

Amount of 40-pound bags:

Amount of 60-pound bags:

Amount of 80-pound bags:

Determine the volumen of concrete you'll need in your projects.

When the number of steps is equal to 1 (the base case). The steps calculator is guided by this formula:
PD x H x W
Where PD corresponds to the platform depth, H corresponds to the rise height, and W corresponds to the width.

When the number of steps is greater than 1. The steps calculator is guided by this formula:
(N x PD x H x W) + H x W x RD x (1 + ... + (N - 1))
Where N corresponds to the number of steps, PD corresponds to the platform depth, H corresponds to the rise height, W corresponds to the width, and RD to the run depth.
